column2: "You found it? Excellent! With this, I can restore the weapon to its original form!"
"Thank you, <%me>! Leave the rest to me."
"My heart is pounding just thinking about what this will be like once it's restored!"
"That, and recently new weapon ideas have been overflowing in my mind!"
"I don't think I've ever had inspiration like this before. No, definitely not!"
"There are so many things I want to make, but I also want to fix this one! I don't know where to start!"

"I shouldn't get too ahead of myself.
I'm heading back to my workshop on ship 128, Themis to work on it!"
"Once the repairs are complete, I'll contact you right away. Just give me some time."
